entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
